sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_e1c14afb3d6af80012f6878bb9a8b952
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.LightMessenger</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Provide JS functionality for Incident Management light changes </description><name>LightMessenger</name><script><![CDATA[var LightMessenger = Class.create();
LightMessenger.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {
	},
	
	changeLight : function (light_id, color) {
		var url = "light/"+light_id+"/color/"+color;
		return this._sendMessage(url);
	},
	
	changeLocation : function (location_name, color) {
		var url = "location/"+location_name+"/color/"+color;
		return this._sendMessage(url);
	},
	
	changeLights : function (list) {
		var len = list.length;
		var light_list = [];
		for (var i = 0; i < len; i++) {
			light_list.push('{"id": "'+ list[i].id +'", "color": "'+ list[i].color+ '"}');
		}
		var light_json = "'{\"lights\" : [ "+ light_list.join() + "]}'";
		
		return this._sendMessage("lights", light_json);
	},
	
	changeLocations : function (list) {
		var len = list.length;
		var location_list = [];
		for (var i = 0; i < len; i++) {
			location_list.push('{"name": "'+ list[i].name +'", "color": "'+ list[i].color+ '"}');
		}
		location_list = "'{\"locations\" : [ "+ location_list.join() + "]}'";
		
		return this._sendMessage("locations", location_list);
	},
	
	_sendMessage : function(url, payload) {
		payload = typeof payload !== 'undefined' ? payload : '';
		var xmlDoc = new XMLDocument("<parameters></parameters>");
		var parameterNode = xmlDoc.createElement("parameter");
		xmlDoc.setCurrent(parameterNode);
		xmlDoc.setAttribute("name", "name");
		xmlDoc.setAttribute("value", "groovy defcon.groovy " + url + " " + payload);
		
		var ecc_message = new GlideRecord("ecc_queue");
		ecc_message.initialize();
		ecc_message.agent = //"mid.server.name"
		ecc_message.name = "LightMessage";
		ecc_message.topic = "Command";
		ecc_message.payload = xmlDoc.toString();
		ecc_message.queue = "output";
		return ecc_message.insert();
	},
	
	type: 'LightMessenger'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2013-01-02 20:14:39</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>e1c14afb3d6af80012f6878bb9a8b952</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>LightMessenger</sys_name><sys_package/><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_e1c14afb3d6af80012f6878bb9a8b952</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-03-06 17:56:42</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

The lighting system is unavailable.

"save_light" : "save_event"; var locationList = []; if(castle){ locationList.push( { name: "Location1", color: location1 } ); } if(austin){ locationList.push( { name: "Location2", color: location2 } ); } if(sanfran){ locationList.push( { name: "Location3", color: location3 } ); } var messenger = new LightMessenger(); var message_sys_id = messenger.changeLocations(locationList);

Change in progress...

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_label/><action_name/><action_query>false</action_query><action_run_at>server</action_run_at><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><application/><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>u_im_light</collection><condition>current.u_location1 == 'GREEN' && current.u_location2 == 'GREEN' && current.u_location3 == 'GREEN'</condition><description>When all three locations are set to green.  Clears the related incident</description><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Clear Current Incident when lights green</name><onclick/><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><read_access_action>false</read_access_action><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[//Business rule clears the current incident field when lights go back to green.
//When new Locations come online, add those locations to the condition of this business rule.
current.u_current_incident_event = '';]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2012-12-05 20:45:32</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>5c5bfd7e3dcef00012f6878bb9a8b944</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Clear Current Incident when lights green</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package/><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_5c5bfd7e3dcef00012f6878bb9a8b944</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-03-06 18:00:22</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script></record_update>
